required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Different Biomimetic Materials on White Spot Lesions in Enamel
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Different Biomimetic Materials on White Spot Lesions in Enamel

brief_summary.textblock: This study will be conducted to evaluate: 1- The remineralizing effect of different biomimetic materials (Zinc carbonate hydroxyapatite nanoparticles, Poly-amido amine (PAMAM) and bioactive glass nanoparticles) on white spot lesions in enamel. 2- The clinical efficacy of these agents on disappearance of these white spots.

primary_outcome.measure: change in remineralization from base line to time limit
primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate and one month and two months
primary_outcome.description: Change in its density in digital xray

primary_outcome.measure: changes of appearance from base line photograph to time limit
primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate and one month and two months
primary_outcome.description: White spots disappear on digital photography

arm_group.description: Toothpaste to be added on white spot lesions in dental enamel
Toothpaste to be added on white spot lesions in dental enamel
Resinous material to be painted on white spot lesions in dental enamel

intervention.description: Immediate and after one month and after two months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Total of 21 patients enrolled in this study will be selected having at least 4 teeth (one on each quadrant) which will be extracted for orthodontic treatment.
- These patients will be selected according to age groups between 15-25 years old
- good oral hygiene
- free of destroying habits for dental tissues
Exclusion Criteria:
- Bruxism
- soft drinks consumption
- acid regurgitation, etc.).
- Selected teeth having any cracks, malformations, dysplasia or caries.

facility.name: Faculty of dental medicine for girls branch of Alazhar University

responsible_party.investigator_title: Dental specialist at benha teaching hospital
